content: Combine the Chinese ancient poem "Using the Chinese ancient poem "Inspired by the Chinese ancient poem "赠君明月满前溪，直到西湖畔。", create an oil painting-style artwork that reflects the poetic charm and characters." as the source of inspiration, draw a realistic-style picture that highlights the scene details and atmosphere." with cyberpunk elements to design a unique image blending tradition and sci-fi.
author: 毛滂
